title: Zero kara Hajimeru Mahou no Sho
synopsis: In a world of constant war between humans and witches, there exist the "beastfallen"â€”cursed humans born with the appearance and strength of an animal. Their physical prowess and bestial nature cause them to be feared and shunned by both humans and witches. As a result, many beastfallen become sellswords, making their living through hunting witches.
